translator_notes: This table of contents page lists chapters 1-20 with their titles and page numbers
Chapter titles in Dream of the Red Chamber typically consist of two parallel phrases summarizing key events
「凡例」refers to the editorial principles/guidelines written by Zhiyan Zhai commentator
「通灵」refers to the Jade of Spiritual Understanding (通灵宝玉), the magical jade Baoyu is born with
「风月鉴」(Mirror of Romance/Wind and Moon Mirror) is a magical mirror that plays a key role in Chapter 12
Chapter 17-18 share the same title as they were originally one chapter that was later split
Page numbers refer to the internal pagination of this edition, not PDF page numbers
research_notes: The chapter titles follow the classical Chinese convention of parallel couplets (对仗)
Many chapter titles contain wordplay and foreshadowing that becomes clear only upon re-reading
